short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover customer problems to solve. Like StumbleUpon, but for makers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The internet is full of people venting their product frustrations. Using this extension, you can discover these problems and then go off and solve them.
